name: mannerly
content:

following polite ways of treating other people and behaving in public: The 1950s are often seen as the last years of a quaint and mannerly Britain. Is it true that people everywhere are less mannerly than they used to be?
More examplesFewer examplesHer husband chaired the meeting with such mannerly charm.Each generation seems to feel that new generations are less mannerly than preceding ones.What is the next mannerly step in this situation? Our parents had taught us to be obedient, truthful and mannerly.
